Message:
I completely forgot that
some tribes revere animals
as their guardian deities...!

So now, I’m a bad guy trying to
take their precious guardian!
Worst case scenario,
they might even
sentence me to...!

That slimy city official!!
He knew this would happen,
didn’t he?!

I have to plead my case!
If that girl learns the truth,
surely she’ll take pity on me
and undo these restraints—

“Why do you resist?
The weak are destined to die.
It’s the law of nature.”

“‘Law of nature’...?
Do you really think that
just because humans are weaker,
any injustice against us
is deserved?”

I might, for only
being able to save myself...

But, the rest of my tribe who
fought to protect our land,
and my mother, didn’t deserve
to be burned alive...!

The weak are destined to die...?
And that’s just the law of nature...?

“Guess that ‘guardian deity’
shtick is just a name to you.
In the end, you’re no different
from those people in the city.”

“Don’t you dare lump me in
with those People of the Stone!
I’m...!”

...Though, that sounds like
more than just anger...

Well, it’s not my problem,
either way...
